SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Admin Experience: Support Your Storefront's Requirements with Fewer Obstacles

Deliver your organization's fully realized storefront solution and spend less energy working around technical limitations. This release enhances support for some default features to make them easier to implement and maintain.

Easily Specify a Landing Page for Customer Service Representatives (CSRs)
Optimize your organization's workflow for a customer service representative (CSR) that logs in to your storefront on behalf of a buyer. You can now specify which Visualforce page a CSR navigates to after they log in.
Implement Air-Based and Customized Shipping Solutions More Easily
Deliver a more intelligent checkout experience that properly evaluates the available shipping methods for products in the cart. This release enhances the default product shipping logic to provide a better starting point for your solution's specific shipping requirements. These enhancements include default logic to account for air-based shipping methods.
